StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.name: [GetCandidateSpecialExamForPerson]
StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.body:
(@PersonID int) AS
SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER (Order by MARINE_CANDIDATE_ID) AS ID ,[MARINE_CANDIDATE_ID] ,[SPECIAL_EXAM_TYPE] ,[SPECIAL_EXAM_DATE] ,[SPECIAL_EXAM_SCORE] ,[SPECIAL_EXAM_SCORE2] ,[SPECIAL_EXAM_SCORE3] ,[SPECIAL_EXAM_VERSION] FROM [dbo].[CANDIDATE_SPECIAL_EXAM] WITH (NOLOCK) WHERE MARINE_CANDIDATE_ID = @PersonID
